abstract: Tech is seeping into everything — but feels blindsided when its politics are called into question. Also, the Apple car and a short-term Twitter hire.
snippet: Tech is seeping into everything — but feels blindsided when its politics are called into question. Also, the Apple car and a short-term Twitter hire.
lead_paragraph: Each Saturday, Farhad Manjoo and Mike Isaac, technology reporters at The New York Times, review the week’s news, offering analysis and maybe a joke or two about the most important developments in the tech industry.

headline.main: Farhad’s and Mike’s Week in Tech: The Political Evolution of Silicon Valley

byline.original: By Farhad Manjoo and Mike Isaac
